com.project42.iplanner.Groups

Class GroupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project42.iplanner.Groups.GroupController

  • public class GroupController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a group controller.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GroupController getInstance(android.content.Context _mCtx)
        Obtains the group controller singleton reference by passing it the current activity to be used in. If the _mCtx parameter is null, the current context of this class will be used instead.
        Parameters:
        _mCtx - The current activity for the group controller to be used in.
        Returns:
        The current instance of the group controller singleton class

      • deleteGroup

        public void deleteGroup(int grpID)
        The method to delete a group. Deletion of a group requires its ID property.
        Parameters:
        grpID - The ID of the group which is to be deleted.

      • getGroup

        public void getGroup(Group group)
        The method to get either a group or groups. Retrieval of a group or groups requires the group object.
        Parameters:
        group - The group object with its groupName property set.

      • addGroup

        public void addGroup(java.lang.String groupName,
                     java.lang.String channelUrl,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> memberNames,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> adminNames)
        The method to create a group. Creation of a new group requires all the parameters to be non-empty.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The group name as entered by the user.
        channelUrl - A string of randomly generated characters that is used to distinguish each group chat channel, as assigned by Sendbird API.
        memberNames - A list of member's names required to track members in each group.
        adminNames - A list of admin's names required to track admins in each group.

      • updateGroup

        public void updateGroup(java.lang.String channelUrl,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> memberNames,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> adminNames)
        The method to add new members or admins to a group. This method accepts the updated list of member's or admin's names, depending on which role is to be added. Adding of new members or admins requires all the parameters to be non-empty.
        Parameters:
        channelUrl - A string of randomly generated characters that is used to distinguish each group chat channel, as assigned by Sendbird API.
        memberNames - A list of member's names required to track members in each group.
        adminNames - A list of admin's names required to track admins in each group.
